name: The Golden Gnome
description:
A team of 5 explorers ventured through a maze in search for a Golden Gnome. However, only one person can go in at a time. 

   Credits  

Art Team:  DoomGnomes, Jess Andz, ahihi.

Programming & Level Design: CatGazing (Nahuel).

Music: DoomGnomes.

Font: codeman38 | cody@zone38.net | http://www.zone38.net

CCO sounds: open game art | https://opengameart.org/

Textures: https://opengameart.org/content/big-pack-of-hand-painted-tiling-textures
